resources:
Sample Request camera and notification permission Request audio permission
We need your camera permission to take photos for the profile Camera permission denied Camera permission denied permanently. Please go to Settings -> Apps -> PermissionEdge and allow camera permission
We need your audio permission to record audio Audio permission denied Audio permission denied permanently. Please go to Settings -> Apps -> PermissionEdge and allow audio permission
We need your read contact permission to get contact information Read contact permission denied Read contact permission denied permanently. Please go to Settings -> Apps -> PermissionEdge and allow read contact permission "
